responses.text: Do you want to come with me?
Saw some rabbits that way, wanna go see?
You should come with me for your own sake.
We can help each other out.
We both go our separate ways. No trouble here.
Forget it. No use to anybody.

I'm collecting gear and selling it.
I'm a wandering master of martial arts.
I'm looking to make an honest living using the skills I gained in the country.
I'm a killer for hire.
I'm just here for the paycheck.
